title: Mini Beef Wellingtons and Red Wine Sauce
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 beef fillet steaks', '100g chopped fresh mushrooms', '4 tablespoons red wine', '250ml beef consomme', '75g foie gras pate', '1 (500g) package puff pastry', '1 egg, beaten', 'Sauce', '3 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons chopped spring onion', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '250ml beef consomme', '125ml red wine', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
